otherNames: 都市古仙医,  Immortal Doctor In Modern City
synopsis: Ye Bufan, a junior student, tried to scam a car to raise medical expenses for his mother. Unexpectedly, he encountered a female driver who did not play by the rules. After being hit, Ye Bufan accidentally traveled to a fantasy world and obtained the inheritance of ancient medicine. From then on, he mastered medical skills, practiced martial arts, and won the favor of countless beautiful women.
